Docs.summary: Metadata about the shape of entities, the relationships between them, and how they map to the database. A model is typically created by overriding the method on a derived .

remarks.para: The service lifetime is . This means that each instance will use its own instance of this service. The implementation may depend on other services registered with any lifetime. The implementation does not need to be thread-safe.
See Modeling entity types and relationships for more information and examples.
